ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(NOT(LEFT($Profile.Id, 15) ='00e6A000000HNzw'),RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EBH_AMOutreach',ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Completed'),ISCHANGED(Status), OR(ISPICKVAL( EBH_Channel__c , 'GCX Outreach (Phone)'),ISPICKVAL( EBH_Channel__c , 'GCX Inbound (Phone)') ) ) ,true,false) && NOT( $Setup.ActiveValidationRules__c.All_Validation_Rules_Deactivated__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not change Outreach status when Campaign Stopped
